summary: The Western world, or the West, mainly includes countries in Western Europe, Northern America, and Australasia. It's a changing idea that combines culture, politics, and economics from many groups. Some say the West started with Ancient Greece and Rome, but others disagree. The Roman Empire's split in the 4th century CE helped shape the West. Over time, the West grew to include places like Australia and New Zealand, even though they're in the Eastern Hemisphere. The West has been linked to ideas of progress and modernity.
title: Western world
